ygData.subject: fairy guards and how they don't drop diamond dust
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve hunted fairy guards for a few days and they do not drop diamond dust =( They drop Pixie dust The Gearhart quest gives a small item, I ve gotten a leather
ygData.messageBody:
I've hunted fairy guards for a few days and they do not drop diamond dust =(
They drop Pixie dust

The Gearhart quest gives a small item, I've gotten a leather bracer and a
small wooden shield so far.

And I have excellent faction.

Catbik Tinkerton

>Lesser faydark. Good luck, I believe they're over level 30 and they're all
>grouped together. If memory serves they cast nasty spells too. While
>you're there you can do the gearheart quest and tell us what it rewards.
>I've never heard of anybody completing that quest.
